mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_phone, me_date) values(#{member.me_id}, #{member.me_pw}, #{member.me_email}, #{member.me_phone}, now())
mapper.update: update member set me_pw = #{member.me_pw}, me_email = #{member.me_email}, me_phone = #{member.me_phone} where me_id = #{member.me_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from post where po_me_id = #{me_id}
select count(*) from comment where co_me_id = #{me_id}
select gr_name from grade join member on me_gr_num = gr_num where me_id = #{me_id}
